column1: #Text=Sam has been , has taken such an interest in this retirement bit that it — it really surprises me .
#Text=Uh , she used to go over and read a book or something .
#Text=But uh , once you understand it , you know , you , you 're interested in getting right in , and going after it .
#Text=I really ought a call , at least Reg Barr , and ask if uh , he 's still speaking to me .
#Text=Well now , he was the one that was up on the left , up there .
#Text=Well , he came over to you all smiles , I noticed .
#Text=Well , we 've known each other for thirty - some years , why would n't he ?
#Text=But a- anyway , um , I was so glad that he opened up on this disclosure bit .
#Text=Because it was Burns that 's been objecting to our having it .
#Text=So when he opened up on that , and she followed through , and told about her husband , you know ?
#Text=Not necessarily that she would approve of it , but at least she was n't disapproving .
#Text=And I – I can not get over this .
#Text=And you know , he must have been thinking , when he said he was n't a political appointee , he must have been associating his relationship with Steitler .
#Text=I do n't know how else he could have done it .
#Text=Um , but he did n't say that .
#Text=He said , I loved your hum- humor , uh , and I love you , but , I am not a political appointee .
#Text=And I said , Oh ? How did you get on the board ?
#Text=Well he said , I got a letter from the governor , asking .
#Text=Everybody on there is an app- political appointee , that was n't the point .

#Text=The point was , I could have mentioned what was in the paper about him , that he was related and , you know , had business with Steitler , and I just said , and there 's Doctor Duvall , you know ?
#Text=And then I went to Rotus , who 's a seasoned politician , if there ever was one .
#Text=I said , I 'll apologize next time , and I 'm gon na make hay out of it , do n't you worry .
#Text=I wan na know how you birds got on that board , if you 're not political appointees .
#Text=I do n't have any this year , but I 've grown it other years .
#Text=A little bit of frost , it 's gone .
#Text=I l- I learned that one time the –
#Text=Well , I think it was Barbara that has some seeds .
#Text=Is n't that what you gave the neighbor one time ?
#Text=You gave him some kind of herb .
#Text=I think you – I think you gave him some herb of some kind .
#Text=I may have given – given him some basil , yes .
#Text=I do n't have any this year , I forgot to plant it .
#Text=A good stand of it , if you want any .
#Text=I have a lot of dried or- oregano .
#Text=You smoked it down into the cork , did n't you ?
#Text=You smoked it down into the cork .
#Text=Well , yeah , you do n't like that , do you , but –
#Text=It 's – it 's there , might as well smoke it .
#Text=Friends discuss Sam 's interest in retirement , whether or not some people they know who are involved in politics are political appointees , and growing basil .
